metadata.title: Wednesday, 3rd November, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) why the Toyota Land Cruiser for Chienge Police Station in Chienge District which was brought to Lusaka for servicing almost 4 years ago has not been returned to Chienge;
(b) when the motor vehicle will be returned;
(c) whether the Government has any plans to procure a new motor vehicle for the Police Station to enhance its operations; and
(d) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development when the rehabilitation of the following roads in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency will commence
Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to build modern structures at the following markets in Kabwe Central Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Green Market; and (ii) Mine Market; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29th October) - Resumption of Debate. ___________________________
